result.execSummary:
All charges against Edwin M. Guzman-Galarza in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Edwin M. Guzman-Galarza is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Edwin M. Guzman-Galarza

records.addlTxt: Pros. Discretion: The suspected cocaine was tested and did not contain cocaine. It instead was identified as a prescription-only drug. The defendant provided proof of having a prescription for the drug.
Scheduling conference on November 9, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Jury trial on September 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 7, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Scheduling conference on June 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Scheduling conference on May 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Further proceedings on April 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:47 am - Prosecuting attorney Marconi De Franca Barros appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Edwin M. Guzman-Galarza appeared by video, in custody, at Manitowoc County Jail.  Attorney Nathan J. Heim appeared by video for Edwin M. Guzman-Galarza. Not guilty plea.  Jury calendar.
Further proceedings scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling conference scheduled for May 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Initial appearance on February 17, 2022 at 10:30 am.

2:03 pm - Prosecuting attorney Gail Ann Prost appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Edwin M. Guzman-Galarza  failed to appear.  Attorney Ann Larson appearing for the defendant.  State requests warrant. Court authorizes warrant.
2:24 pm - Defendant now appears by video.  All other parties still present.  Warrant withdrawn.
Initial appearance scheduled for February 17, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Edwin M. Guzman-Galarza
Current: 508 St. Claire Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 01-17-2022)
Prior: 508, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Order to report to MTPD for photo and prints

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of possess cocaine.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 01-31-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 48 hours or, if incarcerated, within 72 hours of release, defendant is to have no contact with 1003A S. 18th Street, Manitowoc, WI, defendant is not to possess any controlled substance and defendant must maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
